titles.title: Tax-Free Pell Grant Act
Tax-Free Pell Grant Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the exclusion of Pell Grants from gross income.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Tax-Free Pell Grant Act
This bill expands the tax exclusion for qualified scholarships to include an exclusion from gross income for amounts received by an individual taxpayer as a Federal Pell Grant.
